content: So, you'll need to modify the <style=Highlight>pogo stick</style> to jump higher to get there.
info: 升级弹簧杆-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}Hoho~, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, you're back. Our planet is about to welcome a meteor shower. The best viewing spot is at the mountaintop.
info: 升级弹簧杆-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Here's an advanced pogo stick. Use it to reach the mountaintop, and I'll be waiting there for you.
info: 升级弹簧杆-莫白_主流程文本3
